QuestData.Title: The Power of the Elements
QuestData.Description: I kept trying to tell that silly goblin his machines are unreliable.$B$BBut the power of the elements; that is deep and abiding. When my apprenticeship is over, I will wield their full power. What I know now should be sufficient to help out our friend Fezzix, though.$B$BTake this windsoul totem and plant it near any of the steam ragers to the west of the village. The totem will gather up the energies of slain elementals. Return the fully charged totem to me and I'll do the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Dorain Frosthoof at Taunka'le Village wants you to use the Windsoul Totem to gather the energy of 10 Steam Ragers.
QuestData.RewardText: <Dorain nods.>$B$BGood. This should be sufficient to show Fezzix exactly what I've been trying to tell him.
